text: Claudio Cafiero (born September 19, 1989) is an Italian professional football player who currently plays for S.S.D. Pomezia Calcio. On 16 August 2016 he was signed by Lupa Roma F.C. on loan. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:F.C.
